title: Currency Converter
text: This is a currency converter using a free API updating values every 30 seconds. In this project, I made a simple screen using the LESS pre-processor via CDN, skipping 'npm' installation, used JavaScript for real-time API calls, with a simple but responsive design for all devices!!
